language: Kadazan Dusun of Taginambur, Kota Belud, Sabah, Malaysia

annotation: old word for first husband is tava
old word for first husband is tava
spouse, usually used to refer to male spouse. Tgr 1898 has it listed for both male and female.
The male of mankind and of all birds. A husband (Crk)
Asawa is a neutral word; both applies to husband and wife
Husband, family head; become old, mature (Ebt)
same as 'man' but a possessive pronoun is used if it means husband
